name: Kubuntu 24.04 LTS (Noble Numbat)
install_guide_markdown:
# Kubuntu 24.04 LTS Installation Guide

Kubuntu provides the KDE Plasma desktop on top of Ubuntu. Use the Desktop ISO for a full graphical install.

install_steps.title: Download Kubuntu ISO
install_steps.detail_md: Download the Kubuntu 24.04 LTS ISO from official mirrors and verify its checksum.

install_steps.title: Verify ISO Checksum
install_steps.detail_md: Verify the ISO integrity using SHA256.

install_steps.title: Create Bootable USB
install_steps.detail_md: Use Rufus (Windows), Etcher (cross‑platform), or dd (Linux/macOS) to create a bootable USB.

install_steps.title: Install Kubuntu
install_steps.detail_md: Boot from USB, start the installer, and follow prompts for language, keyboard, partitioning, and user setup.

install_steps.title: Post‑Install Setup
install_steps.detail_md: Update packages and customize KDE Plasma settings.

commands.command: sudo apt update && sudo apt upgrade -y

license: GPL and other open source licenses
privacy_notes: Ubuntu base may include optional telemetry; can be disabled during setup.
notes: Kubuntu provides the KDE Plasma experience with Ubuntu LTS stability.
